modName: Drem Fah Pah Nahl - The Place of Peace
summary: New outdoor peaceful location with its own history and a quest.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#d8d8d8][size=4]Mod is no longer maintained[/size][/color][/b][/center]

[img]http://mikanoshi.name/img/Logo.png[/img]
[img]http://mikanoshi.name/img/Slider.gif[/img]
[img]http://mikanoshi.name/img/Descr.png[/img]
[size=3][color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF][b]New outdoor location where everyone lives in peace.[/b][/color][b]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]Has its own history and a quest to reveal the mysteries of that magic place.[/color][/b][/size]


[img]http://mikanoshi.name/img/Feat.png[/img]
[b][size=3][color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=DAE5DF]* Drem lives its own life, people wander examining places and creatures, eat, drink, sleep, sing songs,[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]play instruments, rest on the lakeside, praying, etc. [/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]* You can buy food from Saymour and feed animals[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]* You'll obtain unique jewelry with new visual effects and many enchanted armors and weapons during the quest[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]* Some NPCs are a skill trainers (up to 100!)[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]* Fighting controls are not disabled for the sake of the quest so, please, don't be aggressive ;)[/color][/size][/b]


[img]http://mikanoshi.name/img/Install.png[/img]
[b][size=3][color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]1. Use NMM or copy files from mod's Data folder to your game's Data folder[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF](for Steam it's something like C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\)[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]Don't forget to tick DremFahPahNahl.esp in launcher or NMM.[/color]

[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]2. Launch Skyrim and travel to any city, town or village - the courier is already waiting for you :)[/color][/size][/b]


[img]http://mikanoshi.name/img/Recommended.png[/img]
[size=3][color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]- [b]Any HD Pack[/b][/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]- [b]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/b] by vurt[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]- [b]WATER[/b] by OpticShooter[/color]
[color=#313131]. . . . . . .[/color][color=#DAE5DF]- [b]Lush Grass[/b] and [b]Lush Trees[/b] by OpticShooter[/color][/size]
author: Mikanoshi
